content: us terminology i used regular pony beads for this bag chain 2 counts as double_crochet throughout increased in width by making beginning circle larger increase in height by adding more row before row 18 you can use any number color of beads if you want a complete spectrum of colors divide the number of colors by the number of stitches of the end increase row if you need more stitches you can add them in at the last increase row evenly throughout the row gauge not important made in the round slip stitching at the end of each round mc-magic_ring double_crochet-double_crochet half_double_crochet-half_double_crochet sl-slip_stitch repeat around-repeat around single_crochet-single_crochet yo-yarn over please let me know if you have any questions round 1-mc-chain 2 11dc into mc sl into 2nd chain made 12 round 2- chain 2 1 double_crochet in same stitch 2 double_crochet in next stitch repeat around sl into 2nd chain made 24 round 3- chain 2 1 double_crochet in next stitch 2 double_crochet in next stitch repeat around sl into 2nd chain made 36 round 4- chain 2 1 double_crochet in next 2 stitches 2 double_crochet in next stitch repeat around sl with 22nd chain made 48 end increase round 5-15- chain 2 place bead around hook yo half_double_crochet in next stitch pulling through all loops and bead half_double_crochet in next stitch sl with 2ns chain made round 16-chain 2 half_double_crochet in every stitch around round 17- chain 4 skip first 2 stitches double_crochet in next stitch chain 1 skip next stitch repeat around sl into 3rd chain made round 18- scallop border chain 3 4dc into chain 1 space single_crochet into next chain 1 space 5 double_crochet into next chain 1 space repeat around sl into 3rd chain made alt round picot border round 18- chain 3 2 first chain made 3 double_crochet into same chain 1 space repeat around ending with a sl into the chain 3 made in beginning of the round to make draw string- make slip knot chain 120 or less to make
